meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Bilow Scott Lord Alex Jacob Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7170.

td.p: Michael Bilow, a Ph. D. student in computer science from Los Angeles, California
Scott Lord, a construction attorney from Santa Monica, California
Alex Jacob, a currency trader from Chicago, Illinois

tr.td: NAMING THE FIRST PRESIDENT
COUNTING TO 2
WRITING YOUR OWN NAME
PLAYING THEMSELVES
FALLING OFF A LOG
THIS SHOULD BE "EZ"!

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'He was the first president of the Republic of Gran Colombia, established 1819')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Ah, this was a tough one. She was the first woman created to punish man.)
...
(Alex: You\'re coming back next week to play for a quarter-million dollars against these other semifinalists...)
(Catherine: Catherine Hardee, Kinston, North Carolina.)
(Brennan: Brennan Bushee, Malden, Massachusetts.)
(Matt: Matt Jackson, Washington, D.C.)
(Kerry: Kerry Greene, Manchester, New Hampshire.)
(Alex: And, of course, added to all of those people, we have these four high scorers among the non-winners...)
(Andrew: Andrew Haringer, Squamish, British Columbia.)
(Vaughn: Vaughn Winchell, Columbia, Maryland.)
(Jon: John Schultz, Ann Arbor, Michigan.)
(Dan: Dan Feitel, Gillette, New Jersey.)
MichaelWho is Thisbe
$8,400
ScottWho is Demeter
$4,000
AlexWho is Gaea
$143
Pandora')

Famous mother of Pyrrha, who survived the Great Flood & with her husband repopulated the Earth

Scott
Michael
Automatic semifinalist
2nd place: $5,000 if eliminated
3rd place: $5,000 if eliminated
Alex
Scott
Michael

(including 1 DD),
